     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16816740">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16816740">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16816740">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16816740">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>

           Communication Librarian,
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business
           <br />
           Subject Specialist
           <br />
           <br />

            kcannon@muhlenberg.edu

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16816743">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16816743">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16816743">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Literary Criticism: Books, Chapters, and Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16816743">
          <div id="boxatt16816743" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19855349">
              <a id="link_19855349" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19855349,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Theatre of Resistance', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free search engine for books and journal articles in all disciplines.Links may take you to free full text, or search the library's site for full text access.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19896966">
              <a id="link_19896966" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19896966,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Theatre of Resistance', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715476}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to historical literature for all regions excluding the U.S. and Canada, 1450-present. Numerous links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19855244">
              <a id="link_19855244" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19855244,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Theatre of Resistance', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717122}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago. Current issues are often to be found in Project Muse (see below). Includes nearly 300 journals specific to language and literature, including American Literary History, American Quarterly, Chaucer Review, College Composition and Communication, College English, College Literature, Early American Literature, ELH, English Journal, New Literary History, Shakespeare Quarterly, Southern Literary Journal, and Yearbook of English Studies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19855315">
              <a id="link_19855315" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=LCO" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19855315,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Theatre of Resistance', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717125}); ">
               Literature Criticism Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               All full text, this extensive archive of criticism of 20th century literary works comes from scholarly journals and books.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19855298">
              <a id="link_19855298" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19855298,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Theatre of Resistance', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717120}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19920723">
              <a id="link_19920723" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19920723,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Theatre of Resistance', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12615315}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16816745">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16816745">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16816745">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16816745">
          <div id="boxatt16816745" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19855246">
              <a id="link_19855246" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19855246,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Theatre of Resistance', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855246}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19855247">
              <a id="link_19855247" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19855247,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Theatre of Resistance', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855247}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19855428">
              <a id="link_19855428" href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19855428,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Theatre of Resistance', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855428}); ">
               Annotated Bibliography Samples
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               For help in writing annotated bibliographies, visit Purdue's Online Writing Lab for a definition and examples of an annotated bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
